vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
MultiplicatorX4.multiply (patch_3.sol#18-21) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- adr.transfer(this.balance * 4) (patch_3.sol#20)

external-function
external-function
solc-version

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
